declarations.name: createRouter
declarations.description: Creates and returns a new OpenAPIHono router instance configured with AppBindings and strict mode set to false. This router is used to define REST API routes with OpenAPI documentation support.

returns.description: An instance of OpenAPIHono<AppBindings> configured for the application's API routing.

declarations.implementationNotes: This function instantiates OpenAPIHono with the application's bindings and disables strict mode, allowing for flexible route definitions.

declarations.name: createApp
declarations.description: Creates and returns a new application instance by invoking createRouter. This is the default export and serves as the main entry point for setting up the API application.

returns.description: An instance of OpenAPIHono<AppBindings> representing the API application.

declarations.implementationNotes: This function simply calls createRouter and returns the resulting app instance. It is intended to be used as the main app factory.

declarations.name: configureOpenAPI
declarations.description: Configures the OpenAPI documentation endpoint for the provided AppOpenAPI instance. It sets up the /doc route with OpenAPI 3.0.0 specification and basic API info.
declarations.implementationNotes: This function adds a /doc endpoint to the provided app, exposing OpenAPI documentation with version, title, and specification version.
